name: test_redeploy_charm_same_model_after_forcing_removal
description: Redeploy the charm in the same model to test that it works after a forceful removal.
descriptionHtml: Redeploy the charm in the same model to test that it works after a forceful removal.

testStage.description: Redeploy the charm in the same model to test that it works after a forceful removal.
